Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VKCapabilitiesInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.vulkan.VKCapabilitiesInstance
  • public class VKCapabilitiesInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the capabilities of a Vulkan VkInstance.
